#Code file for Chasen SDK.

#Day count rules
#
DAYCOUNTRULES
10
0;30/360
1;Act/360
2;Act/365
3;Act/Act(ISMA)
4;30/360
5;30E/360
6;30E+/360
7;Act/Act
8;Act/Act(ISDA)
9;Act/Act(AFB)
#
#Calendar (Business day) rules
#
CALENDARRULES
4
A;Next Bus Day
B;Next Bus Day In Month
C;Next BD Aft Serv Remit
N;No Adjustment
#

#
CURRENCIES
6
E;Euros
F;Swiss Francs
K;Swedish Kronors
L;British Pounds
U;US Dollars
R;Russian Rubles
